issue.title: [Dev] Allow maintainers to use a GitHub API token when merging pull requests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4158](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4158). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I rate limited today on unauthenticated requests for some reason – the failure mode for dev/merge_arrow_pr.py was pretty bad. I'm making the output more helpful and adding an option to use an API token set via environment variable
